item.title: adduction
item.description: when body parts come towards the middle of the body in the case of [[vocal folds|vocal cords]] â†’ they close

item.title: human sound
item.description: Three components lungs [[vocal folds]] (within larynx) articulators ([[tongue]], cheek, lips) Voice type affected by the size of the [[vocal folds|vocal cords]] and vocal tract

item.title: vocal folds
item.description: Anatomy chords attached at the back side to the arytenoids cartilages, to the thyroid cartilages in the front

item.title: voice pitch
item.description: determined by the vibratory frequency of the [[vocal folds]]
